attributes.action: Change the VAT calculation on Fuel Duty!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently fuel is about 99.9p per litre which is made up as follows.
Petrol 34.97p
Duty 50.35p
VAT 14.58p.

The VAT is added LAST. I want it added first.  VAT is a tax on goods and services NOT a tax on goods, services and OTHER TAXES.  By switching it around it would be

petrol 34.67p
VAT 6.06p
Duty 50.35p which totals 91.08p which is an immediate cut of almost 9p per litre.

VAT must not be applied on top of tax. It is wrong, it is stealing, and my guess is maybe against the law!

Sign now.. we aren't asking for an unrealistic ban of duty. We are asking to be treated fairly and transparently
